pageMeta.title: About Us | InfraTech
pageMeta.description: We are the engineers, architects, and operators building the backbone of the digital economy.

hero.headline: Building the Backbone of the Digital World
hero.subhead: We were founded on a simple premise: Software innovation moves fast, but infrastructure is heavy. We exist to bridge that gap.

story.headline: Our Mission
story.content: InfraTech was born from the frustration of managing fragmented vendor ecosystems. We realized that enterprise digital transformation was failing not because of bad code, but because of disconnected execution. Today, we are the only partner that provides a unified chain of custody from the IDE to the Data Center rack.

values.title: Radical Accountability
values.description: We don't blame the vendor. If it breaks on our watch, we own the fix.

values.title: Engineering First
values.description: We sell solutions, not SKUs. Every engagement is led by an architect.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: No hidden margins on hardware. No black-box code. You own what we build.
